Package io.micronaut.azure.logging

package io.micronaut.azure.logging
Logging classes for integration with Azure.
Since:
5.6
  • Class
    Description
    AzureAppender
    Azure appender for Logback.
    AzureJsonFormatter
    Azure JSON formatter.
    AzureLoggingConfigurationProperties
    Configuration for Azure logging.
    ClientFactory
    Creates an Azure log ingestion client wrapper.
    LogEntry
    Contains the logging data sent to Azure.
